positions.title: Magic Leap
positions.description:
- Worked on various tasks in multiple domains like SLAM, Deep Learning, 6-DOF Controller Tracking
- Wrote C++14 code for real-time performance with limited compute, memory and bandwith
- Wrote multi-threaded code with no hardware mutexes and dealt with synchronization issues
- Sped up PC simulation code by 4-10x resulting savings in cloud compute cost and developer time.

- Implemented state synchronization protocol across multiple systems
- Debugged issues such as cache coherency, incorrectly compiled code, crashes, bottlenecks
- Updated PC unit test framework to model and catch above device specic issues
- Created on-device simulation to compute metrics on pre-recorded data for regression testing
- Created scripts to simplify building, ashing, debugging, running tests to improve team productivity

- Received company wide award for helping coworkers and achieving important deliverables
- Worked with external vendors and internal teams based in Florida, Switzerland, and Israel
…
see more

positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description:
- Worked on the Enforcement Team to implement machine learning classifiers to detect abusive videos
- Coded in C++, Python and SQL like language for data analysis
- Responsible for developing new classifiers for automated processing flagged videos
- Analyzed data and implemented new signals to improve classifier recall
- Wrote design docs to describe how new features and required framework would be implemented

positions.title: Software Engineering Intern
positions.description:
- Worked in the cloud team and was responsible for working with the data storage system in Scala
- Responsible for implelemting and testing different kinds of garbage collection
- Wrote tools to visualise the storage system and metrics to compare garbage collection performance

positions.title: Software Engineer Intern
positions.description:
- Worked in the NPC team and helped deliver boss battles and AI enemies in a C++ based game engine
- Responsible for creating AI enemies that were part of external deliverables from start to completion
- Communicated with designers and animators to tune and incorporate feedback into AI enemies
- Incorporated various parts of the game engine to create AI features
- Worked with developers to help find and solve bugs in the game engine
…
see more

positions.title: Software Developer Intern
positions.description:
- Implemented new features and new slideshow effects in C++
- Led redevelopment of partial slideshow framework to improve performance and fix bugs
- Used Git and Perforce as source control

positions.title: Software Developer Intern
positions.description:
- Designed plugins to allow for publishing media to various media services
- Wrote and used code from large code base shared between various Sony applications

positions.title: Software Developer
positions.description:
- Designed and implemented a custom 3D importer in C++
- Importer code utilized the STL, pointers, templates, an OOP design and an external SDK
- Communicated with a third party developer in Germany for SDK support
- Completed the whole importer independently and with minimal supervision
- Wrote daily work logs and Scientific Research and Experimental Development logs
